              [
                "$rate = .05;\n\n// Exports variable to closure's scope\n$calculateTax = function ($value) use (\u0026$rate) { // notice the \u0026 before $rate\n    return $value * $rate;\n};\n\n$rate = .1;\n\nprint $calculateTax(100); // 10"
              ]
            ]
